document.discussion_title: Friday Frenzy training camp tour: Cerro Gordo-Bement - Wandtv.com, NewsCenter17, StormCenter17, Central Illinois News-
document.topic_text: CERRO GORDO -- Head coach Andy Kerley is keeping it old school at Cerro Gordo-Bement, where the Broncos feature one of the best running games in the area. Click the video above for a preview of the 2016 CG-B Broncos!
